cyclone.name: NICOLE
cyclone.current_location: about 350 mi NE of the northwestern Bahamas
cyclone.trajectory: Moving west toward the northwestern Bahamas, then forecast to bend WNW-NW and cross the central/northern Florida Peninsula before recurving north-northeast inland over the Southeast U.S.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: east-central Florida coast (roughly Boca Raton to the Flagler/Volusia County Line)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hallandale Beach FL to Boca Raton FL and Flagler/Volusia County Line FL to Ponte Vedra Beach FL; Altamaha Sound GA to Savannah River GA; portions of west-central Florida coast
weather_observation.warning_coast: The Abacos, Berry Islands, Bimini and Grand Bahama Island (NW Bahamas); Boca Raton FL to Flagler/Volusia County Line FL; adjacent storm-surge zones from North Palm Beach FL to Altamaha Sound GA
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northwestern Bahamas and a large stretch of the southeast U.S. coastline from south Florida northward through Georgia and the Carolinas
